# n8n_executions (Data Source)

Fetches a list of n8n workflow executions with optional filtering

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Optional

- `include_data` (Boolean) Whether to include execution data in the response
- `project_id` (String) Filter executions by project ID
- `status` (String) Filter executions by status (e.g., 'success', 'error', 'running')
- `workflow_id` (String) Filter executions by workflow ID

### Read-Only

- `executions` (Attributes List) List of executions (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--executions))

<a id="nestedatt--executions"></a>

### Nested Schema for `executions`

Read-Only:

- `finished` (Boolean) Whether the execution finished
- `id` (String) Execution identifier
- `mode` (String) Execution mode
- `started_at` (String) Timestamp when the execution started
- `status` (String) Execution status
- `stopped_at` (String) Timestamp when the execution stopped
- `workflow_id` (String) ID of the workflow that was executed
